text: And Pharaoh Neco imprisoned Jehoahaz at Riblah in the land of Hamath so that he could not reign in Jerusalem, and he imposed on Judah a levy of a hundred talents of silver 23:33 100 talents is approximately 3.77 tons or 3.42 metric tons of silver. and a talent of gold.23:33 A talent is approximately 75.4 pounds or 34.2 kilograms of gold.
